page.title: $itemName
page.text: The $itemName acts similarly to the Vanilla Minecraft Signs. When placed beside another $itemName (horizontally), it will connect with them and allow you to write text with no margin spaces between the signs.

page.title: How to use
page.text: The $itemName sign is a multi-line sign. In the configurations panel you can choose if each line has a automatic size based on itâ€™s length, or if it has a line length maximum and all other lines have the same size.
